user.description: Vanda is a global pharmaceutical company focused on the development of innovative therapies to address unmet medical needs and improve the lives of patients.

fullText:
Humans have 46 chromosomes and Dogs have 78 chromosomes.
Should drugs for humans be tested in dogs?  Here is one clear reason why not:
Large stretches of the beagle dog genome are homozygous (same gene from mother and father) making any findings in beagle dogs not even applicable https://t.co/HoEHBoQUJ0
